lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "That doesn't mean we are ready to restore Bretton Woods (the post-World War Two system of fixed exchange rates), but within the (International Monetary Fund) Interim Committee we are thinking in terms of target zones, fluctuation ranges to be implemented and defended," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said the end of the February 22 Louvre accord, in which the partners agreed to cooperate closely to foster exchange rate stability around current levels, clearly alluded to a "system of tentative (fluctuation) margins."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Economic and monetary policy between Treasury Secretary James Baker and Federal Reserve Chairman Paul Volcker.
